Benchmark¶

application/models/benchmark.php

class Benchmark¶
This model benchmarks the database performance.
This model is meant to be used together with Ajax

Example usage in the controller:

<?php
function json_benchmark($test, $db) {
    // $test = 'log_in';
    // $db = 'lbl';

    $this->Benchmark->json_benchmark($test, $db);
    // process the returned JSON data with javascript
}

Methods

json_benchmark($test, $db)¶
Benchmarks the Database Performance.
Internally calls DoBenchmark()
Parameters:
  • $test –

    name of the benchmark test. Available tests are:

    • 'log_in' : db login time
    • 'load_file' : query time from Runinfo.FindRawDataFileInfo()
    • 'load_daq': query time from Daqinfo.LoadDaqInfo()
    • 'load_dcs' : query time from Slowmonitor.GetTemperatureInfo()
    • 'load_diagnostics_list' : query time from Diagnostics.getrunlist()
    • 'load_pqm_list' : query time from Pqm.GetRunList()
  • $db – name of the database to be benchmarked. 'lbl', 'ihep' or 'dayabay'
Returns:

JSON data of the benchmark result

{
"benchmark":"0.0165",
"db":"lbl"
}

Note

The following attibutes and methods are meant to be used internally only.

Methods

DoBenchmark($test, $db)¶

Benchmarks the Database Performance. Refer to json_benchmark()

Returns:elapsed time [sec] from running the benchmark test
